Welcome to Crime Reporter! Crime Reporter Provides a new and easy way for kenyan citizen to access police services and information as well as enabling everyone to contribute towards building a safer society.
TIP-OFF Do you have information on a past or upcoming crime? wih crime reporter you can submit a tip-off anonymously and contribute towards building a safer society.
PEOPLE OF INTEREST View a list of people who are missing or wanted by the Kenyan Police Services.
CRIME-STATS You can view a measure of change in recorded crime,over a given period of time based upon official statistics for offences or offender rates.
